name: Flipping Gravity (Gabe)
description:
This is an endless runner where you flip gravity to avoid obstacles. Unlock all the different maps and characters! Save up coins to buy different skins and explore all the different maps. Get the highest score you can on each different map, see what the best you can do is! See how long you can go as the speed gradually increases!

This game is full of different variations of maps, new obstacles in each map, and a wide variety of character selection. The ads are non-intrusive, and you can watch them for free coins. 

New maps come out in a regular manner until otherwise noted, so keep checking for new maps to play!

Have fun playing this game. Flip that gravity as long as possible and see how long you can tweak the effects of gravity to your advantage. It's a great game to pass time with while waiting in lines, or simply to play to win all the maps. I hope you enjoy!

Halloween Music: http://www.purple-planet.com thanks for the awesome music!
